question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding Pradhan Mantri Suksha Bima Yojana?
1. Available to all bank account holders whose age is between 18 to 60 years
2. Person will be provided accident insurance worth Rs. 2 lakh at just Rs. 12 per annum
3. The cover is for accidental death or permanent total disability
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The Pradhan Mantri Suksha Bima Yojana is available all bank account holders whose age is between 18 to 70 years. Under the scheme Person will be provided accident insurance worth Rs. 2 lacs at just Rs. 12 per annum. The cover is for accidental death or permanent total disability. Insurance amount can also be availed if in a handicapped state. The person would be eligible to join the scheme through one saving bank account only.
